title: FloWuenne/nf-proteindesign-2025 - Design mode samplesheet schema
description: Schema for validating samplesheets in design mode where pre-made design YAML files are provided

sample_id.errorMessage: Sample ID must be alphanumeric with underscores or hyphens only

design_yaml.errorMessage: Design YAML must be a valid file path ending in .yaml or .yml

protocol.errorMessage: Protocol must be one of: protein-anything, peptide-anything, protein-small_molecule, nanobody-anything

num_designs.errorMessage: Number of designs must be a positive integer

budget.errorMessage: Budget must be a positive integer

reuse.errorMessage: Reuse must be true or false
